column2: "Congratulations on clearing the 1st lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 2nd lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 3rd lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 4th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 5th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 6th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 7th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 8th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing the 9th lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"Congratulations on clearing all missions on the 10th lap. This is a wonderful achievement."
"Congratulations on clearing the lap. You cleared every mission, proving your skills among ARKS."
"To be honest, I didn't think anyone would come this far."
"If you've survived this training, then I'm sure you'll survive whatever is yet to come your way."
"I hope that you'll be able to put this experience and effort to use in ARKS in the future."
"I'm sure you're getting tired. However, the mission is not over yet. Try to push yourself even further."

"You cleared every mission on the first lap.
My congratulations.
This is a wonderful achievement."
"If you feel able to keep going, I will tell you more about this exercise at the end of the second lap."

"You cleared every mission on the second lap.
Congratulations on your success.
...That was quite impressive."
"As promised, I will tell you about this training program."
"Based on previous results, five laps have been prepared for this program."
"If you are able to continue, I will tell you more at the end of the third lap."

"You cleared every mission on the third lap.
This is a wonderful achievement.
This was clearly the result of much effort and training."

"Now, about the program...
Did you notice anything about the order of the Interval Areas?"
"That's right, it was based on your past activities. It's essentially an image from your memories."
"This place was created to remind you of all the wonderful things you've done."
"Congratulations for completing the third lap. Try to push yourself even further."

"You cleared every mission on the fourth lap.
There is nothing to say except that you have done superbly well.
You have my deepest respect."
"As I mentioned earlier, only five laps have been prepared for this training program."
"I am truly grateful that you have followed this training so far. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart."
"The challenges will only get harder from here, but please do your best."
"I hope to see you again at the end of the fifth lap."

"You cleared every mission on the fifth lap.
You have completely dominated this training program.
There is nothing left to say."
"I cannot thank you enough. Your performance here has even exhausted me, and I'm only the administrator."
"In future, the effects that occur on each lap will be even more severe."
"The mission will continue as long as you are able to, so try to push yourself even further."

"You cleared every mission on the sixth lap.
You have gone beyond the endless...
There is no other way to describe it."

"You cleared every mission on the seventh lap.
You have gone beyond the endless...
There is no other way to describe it."

"You cleared every mission on the eighth lap.
You have gone beyond the endless...
There is no other way to describe it."

"You cleared every mission on the ninth lap.
You have gone beyond the endless...
There is no other way to describe it."

"You cleared every mission on the tenth lap.
You have gone beyond the endless...
There is no other way to describe it."
"Congratulations on clearing the lap. You have now exceeded a perfect clear of \"Endless Quest: Eternal Rondo\"."
"In future, the effects that occur on each lap will be even more severe."
"The mission will continue as long as you are able to, so try to push yourself even further."
